definition: (of champagne) moderately dry, ratio of the hypotenuse to the adjacent side of a right-angled triangle
details:
adjective
- (of champagne) moderately dry
= synonyms: unsweet
noun
- ratio of the hypotenuse to the adjacent side of a right-angled triangle
= synonyms: secant
- 1/60 of a minute
= synonyms: second
